message: Let's start at the top here: http://cran.r-project.org/web/views/ -- and branch off to a new topic when there's substantial interest.

it's a good idea to be able to quickly replicate your R environment, esp. the library, on other machines. Here's a handy script: http://bridgewater.wordpress.com/2010/12/21/my-favorite-r-packages-installed-with-one-command/ to install all favorite R packages.

ElemStatLearn: Data sets, functions and examples from the book: "The Elements of Statistical Learning, Data Mining, Inference, and Prediction" by Trevor Hastie, Robert Tibshirani and Jerome Friedman. Useful when reading the book above mentioned, in the documentation referred to as ‘the book’: http://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/ElemStatLearn/index.html#
